Title: normalizeUTF8NFKC
Description: Converts a string to NFKC normalized form, assuming the string is valid UTF8-encoded text.
String transformed to NFKC normalization form. String.
Examples: SELECT length('â'), normalizeUTF8NFKC('â') AS nfkc, length(nfkc) AS nfkc_len;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT length('â'), normalizeUTF8NFKC('â') AS nfkc, length(nfkc) AS nfkc_len;
